text: Remsterville is an unincorporated community located within Alloway Township in Salem County, New Jersey, United States.Locality Search, State of New Jersey. The settlement used to contain a few dwellings, a distillery, and an early gristmill which at one point was owned by George Remster.Place Names of Salem County N.J., West Jersey History Project ==References== Category:Alloway Township, New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in Salem County, New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey
title: Remsterville, New Jersey
